channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI's getting better at faking crowds. Here's why that's cause for concern

item.title: Sarah Mullally named first woman Archbishop of Canterbury
item.description: Sarah Mullally has been named as the new Archbishop of Canterbury, becoming the first woman to be chosen to lead the world's 85 million Anglicans.

item.title: Shutdown postpones monthly jobs report. And, Trump dangles a carrot to colleges
item.description: The government shutdown has delayed the monthly jobs report. And, the White House pressures colleges to sign a 'compact' aligning with Trump's agenda.

item.title: New deep tech fund Wave Function Ventures raises $15 million
item.description: Former SpaceX Falcon 9 engineer Jamie Gull, who started the fund, has already made nine investments.

item.title: Trump administration taps Army Reserve and National Guard for temporary immigration judges
item.description: The Trump administration is tapping National Guard and Army Reserve lawyers to be temporary immigration judges after firing dozens of existing judges.
